thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: Connie

author: Connie
title: Connie
text: I have been all over the internet, contacted websites for an independent sheepskin company in Main, Montana, Colorado, then to Amazon, Eddie Bauer, Old Friend and then I came to this website; checked out the slipper & how it was put together & areas where they strengthened for wear...this slipper was IT ... the feel is sumptuous when slipping your feet into them - they are classy and posh, totally awesome slippers ... i know where to get them when these wear out - probably not soon, they are very well made. NOT EXPENSIVE FOR THE FINE QUALITY THEY ARE !! Connie
